name: Weekly Sector ETF Hurst Reversion
description: Mean-reversion system that goes long major U.S. sector ETFs (XLF, XLV, XLE, XLC) on weekly bars when the market shows extreme oversold conditions confirmed by volume and price-rejection. Core signal relies on the Mean-Reverting Hurst Impulse Reversal indicator; positions are sized conservatively at ≤5 % equity, capped to three concurrent trades, with a 2 % trailing stop and 6 % profit target.
